name: Terminull
storyline: As a 1990's hacker you are planting Viruses into government servers to steal information from the attached business servers. For every packet of data stolen, you gain one point. By racing your chosen virus through the maze of circuitry inside the server, you implement glitches into the system, temporarily affecting your control of the virus, but increasing your multiplier by opening up more ports for the data to flow through.
summary: Terminull is a game in which you play as a 1990's hacker that's planting viruses into government servers.
